actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs

official_title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in North Carolina.

summary.text:
Directs the Secretary of the Interior to revise the Coastal Barrier Resources System maps relating to the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in North Carolina to remove the following properties from such system:

 Lot Number 3, Waters Edge in Hampstead, NC 28443; 182 S Beach Road, Wilmington, NC 28405; 311 Windchase Lane, Wilmington, NC 28409; and 225 Chimney Lane Wilmington, NC 28411.

titles.title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in North Carolina.
